item.title: about
item.description:
üöÄ DevOps | SRE | SysAdmin | Tech Leader

Leadership in creating and managing scalable and secure infrastructures. Focused on automation and optimization, with experience in problem-solving within high-demand environments, ensuring uptime and stability.

üêß Systems and Linux Administration

Over 10 years of experience in Linux and systems administration. Skilled in configuring and maintaining servers, network management, and security. Expertise in mass web hosting and newsletter services. Proficient in implementing Proxmox clusters, ensuring high availability and operational efficiency. Scripting expertise in Bash and Python to automate tasks.
